hadiths.text: It was narrated that Muhammad bin Sirin said:“I asked Ibn ‘Umar about sacrifices and whether they are obligatory. He said: ‘The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and the Muslims after him offered sacrifices, and this is the Sunnah.’” Another chain reports exactly the same

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَضَاحِيُّ وَاجِبَةٌ هِيَ أَمْ لاَ
